item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 5, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ukraine says it has attacked North Korean troops in Kursk
2. Dollar weakens as investors rein in bets on Trump victory
3. UK tax plan for wealthy foreigners risks turning London into ‘bigger version of Bahamas’
4. Trump and Harris make final push to break US election deadlock
5. Polls open after Harris and Trump make last-ditch push
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 5, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
